about_the_game:
This token pack contains 20 tokens: The classic pig-faced orcs in a variety of poses and equipment.

This token pack includes:

  • Orc Carrying Sack Peasant
  • Orc Champion with Sword
  • Orc Red Archer Bow
  • 5 Orc Shield and Weapon
  • Orc Thief with Bag
  • Orc Thief with Dagger
  • Orc Water Carrier with Buckets
  • Orc Whip Master
  • Orc with Blunderbus Musket
  • Orc with Crossbow
  • Orc with Sling
  • Orc with Spear
  • Orc with Sword and Axe
  • Ore Wizard or Shaman with Staff
  • Mutated Orc Wizard or Druid with Tentacles
  • Orc Yellow Archer with Bow

Released on May 25, 2014. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.0.10 and higher.

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license. This product should work with all rulesets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
